document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of the cicadas (Hemiptera: Cicadidae) of Hainan Island, China, with description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of the cicadas (Hemiptera: Cicadidae) of Hainan Island, China, with description of a new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Becquartina bleuzeni Boulard, 2005 a: 371
; Lee, 2008 : 7 .

Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♂
, Mt. Limushan, 680 m ,
21 .iv. 2008
, coll. Yang Zhaofu & Men Qiulei (NWAFU); 1 ♀, Mt. Jianfengling,
8 .vi. 1982
, coll. Liang Shaoying (SYSU).
Distribution. China (Hainan), Vietnam and Thailand (Lee, 2008 ).
Remarks. This species is newly recorded from China .

Mogannia cyanea Walker, 1858 : 40
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 110 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 40 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2004 : 63 ; Sanborn, Phillips & Sites, 2007 : 32 ; Lee, 2008 : 19 ; Chen, Yang & Wei, 2012 : 8 .

Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♂
, Mt. Wuzhishan, 700 m ,
20 .v. 2007
, coll. Wang Yinglun & Li Yankai (NWAFU). Distrbution. China (Hainan, Yunnan, Guangdong, Guangxi, Sichuan, Fujian, Jiangxi, Zhejiang, Hunan and Taiwan ), Vietnam , Thailand , India and Myanmar (Chen et al ., 2012 ; Lee, 2008 ).
Remarks. The record of this species from Japan (Chou et al. , 1997 ) could not be confirmed, and is not supported by other literature (e.g. Hayashi & Saisho, 2011 ; Lee, 2008 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2004 ).
Cicada nasalia White, 1844 : 426 .

Mogannia nasalis , Walker, 1850 : 248
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 115 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 40 ; Chen, Yang & Wei, 2012 : 16 .

Material examined. Hainan: 6 ♂♂, Mt. Limushan, 680 m ,
30 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 1 ♀, Mt. Limushan, 650 m ,
21 .iv. 2008
, coll. Fu Qiang & Yang Zhaofu (NWAFU); 10 ♂♂ 1 ♀, Mt. Bawangling, 450 m ,
27 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 5 ♂♂, Jianfeng, 170 m ,
30 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Mt. Tongguling, 20 m ,
22 .vii. 2010
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU).
Distrbution. China (Hainan, Guangdong, Guangxi, Anhui, Zhejiang, Hongkong , Hunan and Fujian), India (Chen et al ., 2012 ).

Mogannia indigotea Distant, 1917 : 103
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 109 ; Lee, 2010 b: 24 ; Chen, Yang & Wei, 2012 : 6 .

Material examined. Hainan: 1 ♀, Mt. Jiangfengling,
9 .v. 1964
, coll. Liu Shengli (NWAFU). Distribution. China (Hainan, Guangxi, Guangdong, Hubei, Sichuan, Yunnan and Fujian), Philippines (Chen et al ., 2012 ).

Mogannia hainana Shen, Lei & Yang, 2006 : 175
; Chen, Yang & Wei, 2012 : 21 .

Material examined. Hainan: 10 ♂♂ 1 ♀, Mt, Bawangling, 450 m ,
27 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 4 ♂♂, Mt. Wuzhishan,
24 .vi. 1960
, coll. Li Binfu (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Mt. Jianfengling,
6 .v. 1964
, coll. Liu Shengli (NWAFU); 8 ♂♂ 3 ♀♀, Mt. Qixianling,
15 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 7 ♂♂ 5 ♀♀, Mt, Limushan,
22 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU).
Distribution. China (Hainan).

Nipponosemia longidactyla Yang & Wei, 2013 : 33
.

Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♂
, Mt. Limushan, light trap,
26 .v. 1984
, coll. Gu Maobin (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Mt. Jianfengling,
1 .vi. 1982
, coll. Liu Yuanfu (NWAFU); 1 ♀, Mt. Jianfengling, 980 m , light trap,
5 .v. 2008
, coll. Fu Qiang (NWAFU).
Distribution. China (Hainan).

Tosena seebohmi Distant, 1904 b: 301
.

Formotosena seebohmi : Kato, 1925 : 60
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 129 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2003 a: 168 ; Pham & Yang, 2009 : 7 .

Material examined. Hainan: 1 ♀, Mt. Limushan, 220 m ,
11 .viii. 2009
, coll. Wang Shuye & Gao Xia (NWAFU); 1 ♀, Mt. Bawangling, 820 m ,
1 .viii. 2010
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU).

Distribution. China (Hainan, Fujian, Jiangxi and Taiwan ), Vietnam (Chou et al. , 1997 ; Pham & Yang, 2009 ). Remarks. The record of this species from Japan (Pham & Yang, 2009 ) could not be confirmed, and is not supported by other literature (e.g. Hayashi & Saisho, 2011 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2003 a).

Paratalainga fucipennis
He, 1984 : 221 ; Chou et al. , 1997 : 157 .
Distribution. China (Hainan).
Remarks. This species was erected by He ( 1984 ) based on one female from Hainan.

Cicada sanguinea
de Geer, 1773 : 221 .

Huechys sanguinea : Jacobi, 1905 : 433
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 99 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 39 ; Lee, 2008 : 21 ; Lee, 2011 : 255 .

Material examined. Hainan: 4 ♂♂ 5 ♀♀, Mt. Limushan, 620 m ,
22 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 2 ♀♀, Mt. Qixianling, 150 m ,
14 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Yinggen, 200 m ,
4 .vii. 1960
, coll. Li Changqing (NWAFU); 2 ♀♀, Mt. Bawangling, 450 m ,
27 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 2 ♂♂, Mt. Jianfengling, 960 m ,
28 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU);
1 ♂
2 ♀♀, Mt. Wuzhishan, 700 m ,
18 .v. 2007
, coll. Wang Yinglun & Li Yankai (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Mt, Diaoluoshan,
17 .iv. 1992
, coll. Wang Min (NWAFU); 2 ♂♂, Longmen, 60 m ,
3 .vi. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU).
Distribution. Central-southern China (including Hainan and Taiwan ), Vietnam , Philippines , Malaysia , Thailand , Indonesia , Myanmar and India (Chou et al. , 1997 ).
Huechy haematica Distant, 1888 b: 454 ; Chou et al. , 1997 : 101 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 40 .

Material examined. Hainan: 2 ♂♂ 1 ♀, Mt. Jianfengling,
16 .v. 1985
, coll. Long Jianguo (SYSU); 2 ♂♂, Mt. Bawangling,
20 .v. 1983
, coll. Zhang Yalin (NWAFU).
Distribution. China (Hainan and Guangxi), Philippines and India (Chou et al. , 1997 ).

Tettigonia splendidula Fabricius, 1775 : 681
.

Scieroptera splendidula : Distant, 1917 : 101
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 103 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 40 ; Lee, 2008 : 21 .

Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♂
, Mt. Jianfengling,
30 .vi. 1981
, coll. Chen Shoumei (SYSU);
1 ♂
, Mt. Wuzhishan, 700 m ,
20 .v. 2007
, coll. Wang Yinglun & Li Yankai (NWAFU).

Distribution. China (Hainan, Sichuan, Guangxi, Guizhou, Yunnan and Fujian), Vietnam , Thailand , Malaysia , Philippines , Laos , Indonesia , Myanmar , Nepal and India (Chou et al. , 1997 ; Lee, 2008 ).

Cicada crocea
Guérin-Méneville, 1838 : 182 .

Scieroptera crocea : Jacobi, 1905 : 433
; Liu et al. , 1994 : 185 ; Lee, 2008 : 22 .

Distribution. China (Hainan), Vietnam , Malaysia , Indonesia , Myanmar and India (Liu et al. , 1994 ; Lee, 2008 ). Remarks. This species was recorded from Mt. Jianfengling of Hainan by Liu et al. ( 1994 ).

Remarks. Lee ( 2012 ) transferred
Katoa Ouchi
from Tibicinini to Cicadettini of the subfamily Cicadettinae . It is retained in Tibicinini of Tettigadinae according to Moulds ( 2005 ) pending further phylogenetic analysis.

Katoa chlorotica Chou
& Lu, in Chou et al. , 1997 : 94 ; Pham & Yang, 2009 : 4 .

Material examined. Hainan: 2 ♂♂ 4 ♀♀, Mt. Wuzhishan, 340 m ,
25 .vi. 1960
, coll. Li Changqing (NWAFU); 1 ♀, Qiongzhong,
6 .vi. 1983
, coll. Zhang Yalin (NWAFU); 1 ♀, Mt. Limushan,
8 .v. 1929
, coll. unkown (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Jianfeng,
1 .vi. 1982
, coll. Gu Maobin (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Mt. Bawangling, 380 m ,
27 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Xinglong,
11 .v. 2008
, coll. Wang Zongqing (NWAFU).
Distribution. China (Hainan and Yunnan), Vietnam (Chou et al. , 1997 ; Pham & Yang, 2009 ).
